definitions.definition: Anger or displeasure stemming from belief that one has been wronged or betrayed by others; indignation .
The state of holding something in the mind as a subject of contemplation , or of being inclined to reflect upon it; feeling ; impression .

main_definition: Anger or displeasure stemming from belief that one has been wronged or betrayed by others; indignation .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) The state of holding something in the mind as a subject of contemplation , or of being inclined to reflect upon it; feeling ; impression .
